meaningMnemonic: The "<radical>Cliff</radical> of <radical>Ten Thousand</radical> <radical>Power</radical>" is where you go if you want to be <kanji>encourage</kanji>d.
readingMnemonic: When you get there, it does <kanji>encourage</kanji> you. The cliff says "Hey, I encourage you to buy a <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun."
